nodes.text: The Hyland Organization for Rakghoul Neutralization

The Hyland Organization for Rakghoul Neutralizaton (also known as THORN) was a philanthropic agency that sought to eradicate the rakghoul pandemic. The organization was created by the CEO of Galactic Solutions Industries Addalar Hyland, and was tasked with not only finding the cure for the plague, but also the elimination of planetary infestations. Agents of the group were commonly called "Neutralizers," some of which were talented volunteers.
